derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from French austérité, from Latin austeritas, from austerus 'severe' (see austere)

entry.def: Austerity is a situation in which people's living standards  are reduced because of economic difficulties.

example.ex: ...the years of austerity which followed the war.

entry.def: If you refer to something as showing austerity, you like its plain and simple appearance.

example.ex: ...many abandoned buildings, some of which have a compact classical austerity and dignity.
